name: The Bridge People No Longer Cross
name_original: The Bridge People No Longer Cross
description:
Parsee has hired you to help rebuild her bridge. Funded by a mysterious benefactor, she has a goal of her own in mind. Build beams, line up ramps, and set traps so the visitors reach their final destination!

A game by Hrusa, Ufonek, Adalin, AngryCow and Saturn
